description: busy city square with many people; carriages at center middle ground; buildings in background at right; bare trees
inscription:
Signature, Title, Inscription and Stamp

LLC, in pencil: [no 227]; at bottom of mount, in pencil: dealer\'s inscription
markings: LRQ, stamped in red: [A L L]; LRQ, stamped in black: [AB in circle] A. Beurdeley monogram L.421
provenance: A. Beurdeley, Lugt 421 (1847-1919), Paris. [Judith L. Pillsbury, Paris, until 1991; sold in November for LAT, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1991-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LLC, in the print: [A LEPERE]; LRC, in pencil: [A Lepère]; bottom edge, in pencil: [Le Boulevard (illegible) de la porte St Denis]
title: Streets near the Harbor of St. Denis
